name: *modules*

sections.text:
The value of *modules* is a list of names of the modules that have been
loaded into the current Lisp image.

_otext:

*modules*                                                        [Variable]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Value Type::
............

a list of strings.

Initial Value::
...............

implementation-dependent.

Description::
.............

The value of *modules* is a list of names of the modules that have been
loaded into the current Lisp image.

Affected By::
.............

provide

See Also::
..........

*Note provide; require:: , require

Notes::
.......

The variable *modules* is deprecated.
